item.title: OpenSMTPD Forwarding on Ubuntu
item.description: It is handy to have your system send you an email alert if it detects an issue or potential security risk. Unfortunately, this isn’t always straightforward, especially if you want to send an email from your desktop computer. Sending an email directly from your desktop to your email provider is likely going to accomplish absolutely nothing. The email will likely be blocked since it is from an unknown source, i.e. your desktop.
